text: TSV St. Otmar St. Gallen is a Swiss handball team located in St. Gallen. Their home matches are played at the Kreuzbleiche-Halle. They compete in Swiss Handball League. ==Accomplishments== *Swiss Handball League: **Winners (7) : 1971, 1973, 1974, 1981, 1982, 1986, 2001 *Swiss Handball Cup: **Winners (4) : 1980, 1981, 2000, 2001 *European Champions Cup: **Runner-Up (1) : 1982 *EHF Cup: **Semifinalist (2) : 1988, 2009 *EHF Challenge Cup: **Semifinalist (1) : 2005 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" !
